character.data.murakh.name: Murakh
character.data.murakh.description: Murakh lives communing with the surrounding Elemental Gods. The Conjunction of the planes lead to corruption of everything that was and Murakh will not stand for it. The natural order must return.
character.data.murakh.playstyle: Natural born leader, ideal for recruiting and leveraging Followers
character.data.murakh.description.visual: Very heavy and large humanoid frog with glowing yellow eyes. Muscular arms and legs. Torso adorned with a long gold and red necklace. Wearing a pelt for a belt. A small round shield attachd to his right arm, with 6 small gems surrounding a large central gem. Left arm carrying a large spiky mace.
